title: Weeknotes: August 26 – Sept. 1, 2023
description: Stuff I did: 10.5 hours writing — finished editing one chapter and wrote half of a new one Finally submitted my statement of qualifications to the MRSC roster 🙌 30 minutes pruning Blogged about accepting imperfection through gardening Bought 112 mp3s to expand my collection 🎶 Got about 80 through Bandcamp, the rest weren’t available […]

title: Trust people to know what they need
description: And treat people with dignity. A lump sum payment seems way more useful than rationing it out over months — more likely to be spent on a big item than needing to save up. First and last month’s rent is outrageous in expensive places like Vancouver. People act the same way about getting their tax […]
